column5: Will there be a tourney again this year? Is there a thread started yet for signup?
Nothing has been decided yet. Joey has done more than her share of work on this.
Ya, I'll be passing the torch this year for anyone who wants to run it.
I'll do it if you let me know what's involved. Who knows, maybe we can get this thing going by the beginning of February this year!
Go for it Chris. You were a great captain. I'm sure you'd do great running this.
Well if the tourney goes ahead, I have no problem with Chris taking over!
I think Chris is in talks with Roy to get the backround on what is involved.   Art
